_header: Virtues and good living is cleped hypocrisy
_description: On the Evils of the Times — thirty-one irregular unrhyming lines

Bod416.First Lines:
Vertues & good lyuinge is cleped ypocrisietrowþe &
                    godis lawe is clepud heresie…
Bod416.Last Lines:
…ffor ȝif we abide fort hadde ywystþanne is al to
                    late
Bod416.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope,
                        ed.  
             Historical Poems of the XIV and XV Centuries.
         New York: Columbia UP, 1959: 144-5.
